mapper.select: SELECT ATRZF_CD, ATRZF_NAME, ATRZF_CONTENT, ATRZF_REGDATE FROM AUTHORIZATIONFORM order by ATRZF_NAME
SELECT ATRZF_NAME, ATRZF_CONTENT, ATRZF_CD FROM AUTHORIZATIONFORM where ATRZF_CD = #{atrzfCd}

select DRFT_CD, DRFT_TITLE, DRFT_CONTENT, DRFT_DATE, DRFT_STARTDATE, DRFT_ENDDATE, DRFT_REASON, DRFT_SUBMITSE, DRFT_PRGRSSE, DRFT_APRVSE, DRFT_MEMO, ATRZF_CD, EMP_NO from drafting where EMP_NO = #{empNo} and DRFT_SUBMITSE = '임시저장' order by DRFT_DATE desc

SELECT d.DRFT_CD, DRFT_TITLE, DRFT_DATE, DRFT_PRGRSSE, EMP_NO, MAX(pa.ATRZP_DATE) as ATRZP_DATE FROM drafting d LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa ON (pa.DRFT_CD = d.DRFT_CD) WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출' AND DRFT_PRGRSSE = '진행중' group by d.DRFT_CD, DRFT_TITLE, DRFT_DATE, DRFT_PRGRSSE, EMP_NO order by DRFT_DATE desc

select d.DRFT_CD, DRFT_TITLE, DRFT_DATE, DRFT_PRGRSSE, EMP_NO, MAX(pa.ATRZP_DATE) as ATRZP_DATE from drafting d left outer join AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa on (pa.DRFT_CD = d.DRFT_CD) where EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출' and DRFT_PRGRSSE = '반려' group by d.DRFT_CD, DRFT_TITLE, DRFT_DATE, DRFT_PRGRSSE, EMP_NO order by DRFT_DATE desc

select d.DRFT_CD, DRFT_TITLE, DRFT_DATE, DRFT_PRGRSSE, EMP_NO, MAX(pa.ATRZP_DATE) as ATRZP_DATE, DRFT_APRVSE FROM drafting d LEFT OUTER JOIN AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa ON (pa.DRFT_CD = d.DRFT_CD) where EMP_NO = #{empNo} and DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출' AND DRFT_PRGRSSE = '완료' group by d.DRFT_CD, DRFT_TITLE, DRFT_DATE, DRFT_PRGRSSE, EMP_NO, DRFT_APRVSE order by DRFT_DATE desc

SELECT drft_cd, drft_title, drft_content, drft_date, drft_startdate, drft_enddate, drft_reason, drft_submitse, drft_prgrsse, drft_aprvse, drft_memo, atrzf_cd, emp_no FROM drafting where EMP_NO = #{empNo} and drft_cd = #{drftCd}

select e.EMP_NO, e.EMP_SIGN, e.EMP_NAME, d.DEPT_NAME, cd.CD_NAME, pa.atrzp_order, pa.ATRZP_STATUSSE, pa.ATRZP_DATE, pa.atrzp_empno from EMP e left outer join DEPT d on(e.DEPT_CD = d.DEPT_CD) left outer join CODE cd on(e.EMP_RANK = cd.CD_CD) left outer join AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa on(pa.ATRZP_EMPNO = e.EMP_NO) left outer join drafting df on(pa.DRFT_CD = df.DRFT_CD) where df.drft_cd = #{drftCd} order by ATRZP_ORDER asc

select e.EMP_NO, e.EMP_NAME, d.DEPT_NAME, cd.CD_NAME, ref.REF_EMPNO from EMP e left outer join DEPT d on(e.DEPT_CD = d.DEPT_CD) left outer join CODE cd on(e.EMP_RANK = cd.CD_CD) left outer join DRAFTINGREFERENCE ref on(ref.REF_EMPNO = e.EMP_NO) left outer join drafting df on(ref.DRFT_CD = df.DRFT_CD) where df.drft_cd = #{drftCd}

select pa.DRFT_CD, ATRZP_EMPNO, ATRZP_STATUSSE, e.emp_name, dep.DEPT_NAME from AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa left outer join DRAFTING d on(d.drft_cd = pa.drft_cd) left outer join emp e on(pa.ATRZP_EMPNO = e.emp_no) left outer join dept dep on(dep.DEPT_CD = e.DEPT_CD) where ATRZP_STATUSSE = '반려' and d.emp_no = #{empNo} and pa.DRFT_CD = #{drftCd}

SELECT d.DRFT_CD, drft_title, drft_date, e.EMP_NAME, d.EMP_NO, pa.ATRZP_STATUSSE, d.DRFT_PRGRSSE FROM drafting d left outer join emp e on(e.EMP_NO = d.EMP_NO) left outer join AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa on(d.DRFT_CD = pa.DRFT_CD) where pa.ATRZP_EMPNO = #{empNo} and DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출' and DRFT_PRGRSSE = '진행중' and pa.ATRZP_STATUSSE = '대기' order by drft_date desc

SELECT drft_cd, drft_title, drft_content, drft_date, drft_startdate, drft_enddate, drft_reason, drft_submitse, drft_prgrsse, drft_aprvse, drft_memo, atrzf_cd, d.emp_no, e.emp_name, d.DEPT_NAME, cd.CD_NAME, e.emp_sign FROM drafting d left outer join emp e on(d.emp_no = e.emp_no) left outer join DEPT d on(e.DEPT_CD = d.DEPT_CD) left outer join CODE cd on(e.EMP_RANK = cd.CD_CD) where drft_cd = #{drftCd}
mapper.update: UPDATE drafting SET DRFT_PRGRSSE = CASE WHEN DRFT_APRVSE = '전결' THEN '완료' WHEN DRFT_APRVSE = '결재' THEN '진행중' ELSE DRFT_PRGRSSE END WHERE drft_cd = #{drftCd}
UPDATE drafting SET DRFT_PRGRSSE = CASE WHEN DRFT_APRVSE = '결재' THEN '완료' ELSE DRFT_PRGRSSE END WHERE drft_cd = #{drftCd}
UPDATE authorizationpath SET atrzp_statusse = '결재', atrzp_date = sysdate WHERE drft_cd = #{drftCd} and ATRZP_EMPNO = #{empNo}
UPDATE drafting SET DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출', DRFT_MEMO = #{drftMemo}, DRFT_PRGRSSE = '반려', DRFT_APRVSE = '반려' WHERE drft_cd = #{drftCd}
UPDATE authorizationpath SET atrzp_statusse = '반려', atrzp_date = sysdate WHERE drft_cd = #{drftCd} and ATRZP_EMPNO = #{empNo}
mapper.select: SELECT d.DRFT_CD, drft_title, DRFT_DATE, e.EMP_NAME, DRFT_PRGRSSE, DRFT_APRVSE FROM drafting d left outer join emp e on(e.EMP_NO = d.EMP_NO) left outer join DRAFTINGREFERENCE ref on(d.DRFT_CD = ref.DRFT_CD) where ref.ref_EMPNO = #{empNo} and DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출' order by drft_date desc

SELECT d.DRFT_CD, drft_title, drft_date, e.EMP_NAME, d.DRFT_PRGRSSE , to_char(pa.atrzp_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as atrzp_date, DRFT_APRVSE FROM drafting d left outer join emp e on(e.EMP_NO = d.EMP_NO) left outer join AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa on(d.DRFT_CD = pa.DRFT_CD) where pa.ATRZP_EMPNO = #{empNo} and pa.ATRZP_STATUSSE = '결재' and d.DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출' order by drft_date desc

SELECT d.DRFT_CD, drft_title, drft_date, e.EMP_NAME, d.DRFT_PRGRSSE , to_char(pa.atrzp_date) as atrzp_date, d.DRFT_MEMO FROM drafting d left outer join emp e on(e.EMP_NO = d.EMP_NO) left outer join AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa on(d.DRFT_CD = pa.DRFT_CD) where pa.ATRZP_EMPNO = #{empNo} and pa.ATRZP_STATUSSE = '반려' and d.DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출' order by drft_date desc

select d.DRFT_MEMO , e.EMP_NAME, d.DEPT_NAME, CD_NAME from drafting d left outer join AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa on(d.DRFT_CD = pa.DRFT_CD) left outer join emp e on(e.EMP_NO = pa.ATRZP_EMPNO) left outer join code cd on(e.EMP_RANK = cd.CD_CD) left outer join DEPT d on(e.DEPT_CD = d.DEPT_CD) where d.DRFT_CD = #{drftCd} and pa.ATRZP_STATUSSE = '반려'

select abm.ABM_CD, ABM_NAME, bml.APPL_EMPNO, e.EMP_NAME, bml.APPL_ORDER, dep.dept_name, CD_NAME from APPBMLINE bml left outer join emp e on(e.EMP_NO = bml.APPL_EMPNO) left outer join APPBOOKMARK abm on (bml.ABM_CD = abm.ABM_CD) left outer join DEPT dep on(dep.dept_cd = e.dept_cd) left outer join CODE cd on(cd.CD_CD = e.EMP_RANK) where abm.EMP_NO = #{empNo} order by APPL_ORDER, ABM_NAME asc
mapper.update: UPDATE authorizationform SET atrzf_content = #{atrzfContent}, atrzf_name = #{atrzfName}, ATRZF_REGDATE = sysdate WHERE atrzf_cd = #{atrzfCd}
mapper.select: select atrzf_cd, to_number(substr(atrzf_cd,3)) as atrzfCustomCd from AUTHORIZATIONFORM order by 1 desc

select d.DRFT_CD, DRFT_TITLE, DRFT_DATE, DRFT_SUBMITSE, DRFT_PRGRSSE, DRFT_APRVSE, e.emp_name, dep.dept_name from drafting d left outer join emp e on(e.EMP_NO = d.EMP_NO) left outer join dept dep on(dep.dept_cd = e.dept_cd) where DRFT_PRGRSSE = '완료' and DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출' order by DRFT_DATE desc

SELECT count(d.DRFT_CD) FROM drafting d left outer join emp e on(e.EMP_NO = d.EMP_NO) left outer join DRAFTINGREFERENCE ref on(d.DRFT_CD = ref.DRFT_CD) where ref.ref_EMPNO = #{empNo} and DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출'

SELECT count(d.DRFT_CD) FROM drafting d left outer join emp e on(e.EMP_NO = d.EMP_NO) left outer join AUTHORIZATIONPATH pa on(d.DRFT_CD = pa.DRFT_CD) where pa.ATRZP_EMPNO = #{empNo} and pa.ATRZP_STATUSSE = '반려' and d.DRFT_SUBMITSE = '제출'
